DOC.HEADLINE: U.S. WOMEN , REMAINING PERFECT IN GOODWILL BASKETBALL , TAKE GOLD
DOC.TEXT: The U.S. women ' s basketball_team , getting 18 points from Lisa Leslie , won its first gold medal in a major championship in four years by beating France , 87-63 , Sunday at the Goodwill Games . It was the third consecutive gold medal in the Goodwill Games for the U.S. women , who have a 14-0 record since the competition began in 1986.The Americans took the gold that year , and again in 1990 . It was their first gold medal since the 1990 world championships , however . Sheryl Swoopes added 14 points for the Americans . Dawn Staley , Ruthie Bolton-Holifield and Shanda Berry had 11 points each . Catherine Melain led France with 16 points . The United States led from the start , building a 39-19 lead at halftime . The closest the_French came_in the second_half was a 17-point deficit .
